backend/main.mo: Actor implementing mod storage, user profiles, and authorization-protected queries and mutations for creating, reading, and updating mods and profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing old actor state through unchanged to the new state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, layout, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users for a display name and saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth gate component blocking access when the user is not signed in and showing a sign-in prompt.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App-wide layout with header, responsive navigation, footer, and branding elements wrapping all pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Responsive navigation component showing login/logout and mod links, with separate desktop and mobile menus.
frontend/src/components/mods/FileCompose: Handles uploading, creating, listing, and removing mod files with validation and text file creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModEditorFo: Form for editing mod metadata including title, version, description, and prompt with live validation.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModEnabledT: Toggle switch for enabling or disabling a mod, with loading, error handling, and server update logic.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModShareLin: Displays an unlisted share URL for a mod with copy-to-clipboard support and user feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping canister actor methods for user profiles, mods, and mod state with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global focus, border, and body styling.
frontend/src/lib/bedrockFiles.ts: Utility functions for validating Bedrock mod files by extension, size, count, and formatting size limits.
frontend/src/lib/fileLimits.ts: Defines file count and size limits with helpers to validate and format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/unlisted.ts: Generates random unlisted IDs and builds shareable mod URLs.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates mod metadata fields like title, game name, version, description, and prompt.
frontend/src/lib/webShare.ts: Helpers for Web Share API capability checks and sharing URLs or files with clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BedrockFileOpenerPage: Page for selecting, validating, downloading, and sharing Bedrock mod files via Web Share API.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying user profile info and a list of mods with options to create or manage mods.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero banner, CTAs, Bedrock file opener, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/ModCreateWizardPage.t: Implements a four‑step authenticated wizard for creating and publishing mods with validation and file handling.
frontend/src/pages/ModManagePage.tsx: Provides an authenticated interface to view a mod’s info and update its files, including validation and saving changes.
frontend/src/pages/PublicModPage.tsx: Displays a publicly accessible mod via unlisted link with file downloading, sharing, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity sign‑in flow and redirects users based on profile state, showing a profile setup modal if needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins. Extends theme with OKLCH-driven color variables and custom keyframes for UI components.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s backend-persisted mod toggle feature, listing existing features, new requests, and project metadata. Tracks requirements, versions, and architectural notes for consistent mod enable-state behavior.
